# Prison of Fire (WondArch)
## Overview
**Prison of Fire:** A permanent *[[Wall of Fire (Spell)|wall of fire]]* lines every inch of this stronghold spaceâ€™s outer walls, ceiling, and floor. A *prison of fire* takes normal damage from cold (not one-quarter as most objects). If any 5-foot length of the *prison of fire* takes 20 or more points of cold damage in a single round, the flames go out in that section for 1d4 minutes.

*Caster Level:* 7th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Wall of Fire (Spell)|wall of fire]]**; Market Price:* 14,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 82
